text: Wrecking Crew is an action video game developed and published by Nintendo. It was designed by Yoshio Sakamoto and Makoto Kano. ==References== Category:1984 video games Category:1985 video games Category:Arcade games Category:Intelligent Systems games Category:Famicom Disk System games Category:Game Boy Advance games Category:Mario video games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Nintendo Entertainment System games Category:Pax Softnica games Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Virtual Console games for Wii U
title: Wrecking Crew (video game)
